text:
[Verse]
Up in the skyline glow
Dreams in the city flow
People come and people go
Living life in a Broadway show

[Verse 2]
Hearts beat with the neon gleam
Chasing every wild dream
Nothing's really as it seems
Lost in the electric stream

[Chorus]
Oh oh city lights
Taking us through the nights
Oh oh shining bright
Guiding us like starry flight

[Verse 3]
On the streets where hopes collide
Every corner a new ride
Love and laughter side by side
In the city's turning tide

[Bridge]
Shadows dance with echoes loud
Building stories in the crowd
Whispers weaving through the shroud
In the city's pulsing cloud

[Chorus]
Oh oh city lights
Taking us through the nights
Oh oh shining bright
Guiding us like starry flight
title: City Lights
